Backstory (Not needed but prefered): shisui was raised in the leaf and still grows as his family no longer lives his mother died giving birth to him 
and his father is nowhere to be found shisui trained and trained through trial and error he learned how to use swift release but not to perfection now 
he trains at the acadamey to become a jonin to one day find his father
